New Species Of Superodontella Stach, 1949 (Collembola, Odontellidae) From Western Part Of Ukraine
Article
Full-text available
  • Jun 2007
  • Igor Kaprus
  • Wanda Maria Weiner
Three new species of Superodontella from Ukraine are described and illustrated, S. multisensillata, S. huculica and S. ruta. These new species differ in the number of sensilla on antennal segment IV, in the size of mucro and postantennal organ, in the shape of dental setae and in the chaetotaxy of labium.

Generic revision of Onychiurinae (Collembola : Onychiuridae) with a cladistic analysis
Article
Full-text available
  • Jun 1996
  • Wanda Maria Weiner
Diagnoses and key to the genera of Onychiurinae are given. Six new genera are erected and division of the subfamily into four tribes is proposed. A critical review of morphological characters is included. Phylogenetic relationships of the genera within the tribes are analyzed cladistically. A discussion on the biogeographical distribution is given.

Projects

Project (1)
Synopses on Palearctic Collembola belonging to the family Onychiuridae. Jacek Pomorski, Ihor Kaprus, Wanda Weiner, Grzegorz Panik.
Project
In the research project the taxonomic diagnoses of genera of Collembola from the family Onychiuridae of the world fauna will be formulated, extended descriptions and figures of known species from the Palearctic territory will be prepared, and the keys for their identification will be created. On the basis of analysis of the scientific documentation, literature and archive data the features of ecology, biology, geographical distribution, as well as the history of the study of different Onychiuridae taxa will be analyzed. As a result of this project illustrative and text material for the monograph Synopses on Palearctic Collembola. Family Onychiuridae will be aggregated.
